text: Agdistis nanodes is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Egypt, Iran, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Oman and Yemen.A new species, a new synonym, and new distribution records in the genus Agdistis Hübner, 1825 from Iran (Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths of the Middle East Category:Moths of the Arabian Peninsula Category:Moths described in 1906
title: Agdistis nanodes
